segments.text: I see the water overflowing from the sink and it's making a big puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman doesn't seem to care about the mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's just focused on that plate, completely unaware of her surroundings.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is being so brave, climbing up to get those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can tell the girl really wants a cookie too, her hand is outstretched.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks so unstable, I hope he doesn't fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks lovely, so green and peaceful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the woman will notice the children taking cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is really stretching to reach the jar, he must really want those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like I'm watching a scene from a movie, it's so dramatic.
segments.speaker: PAR
